title: In the Hall of the Mountain King Rhythm

content.question: Which of the following patterns best notates the rhythm of the melody heard in the excerpt?

choices.label: The figure presents a four measure rhythmic pattern in 4/4 time.
The figure presents a four measure rhythmic pattern in 4/4 time.
The figure presents a four measure rhythmic pattern in 4/4 time.
The figure presents a four measure rhythmic pattern in 4/4 time.

content.answer: The figure presents a four measure rhythmic pattern in 4/4 time.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
